Write-Up Text: The social media landscape is buzzing with discussions on the upcoming federal budget in Australia. People are speculating on whether the GST should be raised and questioning Labor's decision to keep the stage 3 tax cuts while refusing to raise Jobseeker payments. The state budget for 2023 is also a topic of discussion with funding cuts to rail maintenance and delays in the North East Link project being reported. On a positive note an initiative to combat scam text messages is in the works.
